Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.name: methodNotFound(_:_:)
Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.abstract: The method couldn’t be found. Usually happens for when you use stringified selectors that do not exist.

Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.name: nonExistingImplementation(_:_:)
Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.abstract: The implementation could not be found. Class must be in a weird state for this to happen.

Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.name: unexpectedImplementation(_:_:_:)
Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.abstract: Someone else changed the implementation; reverting removed this implementation.

Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.name: failedToAllocateClassPair(class:subclassName:)
Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.abstract: Unable to register subclass for object-based interposing.

Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.name: unableToAddMethod(_:_:)
Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.abstract: Unable to add method for object-based interposing.

Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.name: keyValueObservationDetected(_:)
Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.abstract: Object-based hooking does not work if an object is using KVO.

Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.name: objectPosingAsDifferentClass(_:actualClass:)
Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.abstract: Object is lying about it’s actual class metadata.

Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.name: invalidState(expectedState:)
Enums/InterposeError.html#/s:12Interpose.abstract: Can’t revert or apply if already done so.

Enums/InterposeError.html.name: InterposeError

Classes/Interpose/ObjectHook.html#/s:12I.name: original
Classes/Interpose/ObjectHook.html#/s:12I.abstract: The original implementation of the hook. Might be looked up at runtime. Do not cache this.

Classes/Interpose/ClassHook.html#/s:12In.abstract: The original implementation is cached at hook time.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: class

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: hooks
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Lists all hooks for the current interpose class object.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: object
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: If Interposing is object-based, this is set.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: init(_:builder:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Initializes an instance of Interpose for a specific class.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Initialize with a single object to interpose.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: hook(_:methodSignature:hookSignature:_:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Hook an @objc dynamic instance method via selector name on the current class.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Hook an @objc dynamic instance method via selector on the current class.

Classes/Interpose/ClassHook.html.name: ClassHook
Classes/Interpose/ClassHook.html.abstract: A hook to an instance method and stores both the original and new implementation.

Classes/Interpose/ObjectHook.html.name: ObjectHook
Classes/Interpose/ObjectHook.html.abstract: A hook to an instance method of a single object, stores both the original and new implementation.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: whenAvailable(_:builder:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Interpose a class once available. Class is passed via classParts string array.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Interpose a class once available. Class is passed via classParts string array, with completion handler.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Interpose a class once available. Class is passed via className string.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: whenAvailable(_:builder:completion:)
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Interpose a class once available. Class is passed via className string, with completion handler.

Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: Waiter
Classes/Interpose.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: Helper that stores hooks to a specific class and executes them once the class becomes available.

Classes/TypedHook.html#/s:12InterposeKit.name: original
Classes/TypedHook.html#/s:12InterposeKit.abstract: The original implementation of the hook. Might be looked up at runtime. Do not cache this.

Classes/Interpose.html.name: Interpose
Classes/Interpose.html.abstract: Interpose is a modern library to swizzle elegantly in Swift.
